comment: * Defines actions that can be performed on rights-protected content.

variables.name: PLAY
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be played.

variables.name: RINGTONE
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be set as a ringtone.

variables.name: TRANSFER
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be transferred.

variables.name: OUTPUT
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be set as output.

variables.name: PREVIEW
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be previewed.

variables.name: EXECUTE
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be executed.

variables.name: DISPLAY
variables.comment: * The rights-protected content can be displayed.
